positive.explanation: Consultants effectively maintain leadership through clear direction and specific action steps
positive.explanation1: Strong demonstration of urgency creation and intake date guidance through specific deadlines
positive.explanation2: Effective guidance through documentation requirements while maintaining strong control of process

improvement.explanation: Enhanced focus needed on converting expressed interest into firm commitments with specific dates
improvement.explanation1: Stronger demonstration required of how program flexibility accommodates full-time work commitments
improvement.explanation2: More assertive approach needed in setting and managing enrollment deadlines with follow-up

conversations.title: Timeline Commitment Excellence
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: after having your exemptions approved and transferred I will call you to finalize your enrollment
conversations.student_response: we can finalize by the end of this week
conversations.consultant_adaptation: Yeah, absolutely and that's exactly one of the few subjects you're going to be studying about mental health
conversations.recommended_improvement: Include specific day/time commitment for follow-up and immediate next steps

goal_setting.title: Timeline Commitment Excellence
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant took control of the process but didn't set specific follow-up times
goal_setting.student_response: The student showed readiness to commit to a timeline
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: The consultant validated interest but missed opportunity for immediate commitment
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have secured specific day/time commitments for document submission and enrollment
